DOC.brief_summary: This clinical investigation design demonstrate performance characteristic RAMP® cardiac test analyze RAMP® 200 non-laboratorial Operators point-of-care compare result sample analyze RAMP® Reader .
DOC.criteria: Study Arms A Troponin I ( ACS/MI ) 1 . Males Females , 18 year age old , race 2 . Has routine test order Troponin suspect Acute Coronary Syndrome / Myocardial Infarction ( ACS/MI ) per institutional guideline 3 . Willing voluntarily agree sign consent form ( applicable ) Study Arms B Myoglobin ( ACS/MI ) 1 . Males Females , 18 year age old , race 2 . Has routine test order Troponin suspect Acute Coronary Syndrome / Myocardial Infarction ( ACS/MI ) per institutional guideline 3 . Myoglobin test result fall within reportable range test report RAMP® Myoglobin IFU . 4 . Willing voluntarily agree sign consent form ( applicable ) Study Arms C CKMB ( ACS/MI ) 1 . Males Females , 18 year age old , race 2 . Has routine test order Troponin suspect Acute Coronary Syndrome / Myocardial Infarction ( ACS/MI ) per institutional guideline 3 . CKMB test result fall within reportable range test report RAMP® CKMB IFU . 4 . Willing voluntarily agree sign consent form ( applicable ) Study Arm D NTproBNP ( HF ) 1 . Males Females , 18 year age old , race 2 . Has routine test order NTproBNP BNP suspect Heart Failure ( HF ) per institutional guideline 3 . Willing voluntarily agree sign consent form ( applicable ) Study Arms A , B , C Troponin I , Myoglobin , CKMB ( ACS/MI ) 1 . Healthy Subjects 2 . Pregnant lactate 3 . Subjects cardiac marker test order 4 . Blood sample collect > 24 hour prior screen 5 . Subjects without adequate volume surplus EDTA whole blood available require trial test 6 . Noncompliance protocol inclusion criterion Study Arm D NTproBNP ( HF ) 1 . Healthy Subjects 2 . Pregnant lactate 3 . Subjects cardiac marker test order 4 . Blood sample collect > 24 hour prior screen 5 . Subjects without adequate volume surplus EDTA whole blood available require trial test 6 . Noncompliance protocol inclusion criterion
